item.Name: randomly rotate emitter about up vector

plugin._field_explanation: how many particles to spawn per second
reduces the number of particles at distance

_field_real.name: distance fade start:world_units#the distance where the number of spawned particles starts to be reduced
distance fade end:world units#the distance where the number of spawned particles is zero

plugin._field_explanation: types of particles to spawn, from the global particle type library
how long the spawned particles will last
controls where a particle spawns, and its initial velocity

_field_real_bounds.name: directionality:[0-1]#Blends between a random direction and the forward direction
speed scale#scales the initial speed of the particle
subframe offset:frames#spawns particle at subframe time

_field_real.name: rotation randomness:[0-1]#how much the particle is randomly rotated
particle scale modifier:[0-2]#modifies the inherent scale of the particles

plugin._field_explanation: controls the effects of lighting on this particle NOTE: only monochrome lighting is supported in neuticles

_field_real.name: lighting contrast#increase or decrease contrast between bright and dark areas
lighting offset#adjust overall brightness in all areas
lighting min#clamps darkest particles to this exposure
lighting max#clamps brightest particles to this exposure
